LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.DisableAll: Disable all these features if you just high performance vanilla fire.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.MultiFlames.Des: Enabling this will allow multiple flames to inhabit the same tile. This is a cosmetic change, and mechanically it still works like one flame.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.SpecialFX.Desc: Allows wild fires to emit special effects such as sparks.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.Smoke.Desc: If Simple FX: Smoke is installed, enabling this will cause wild fires to emit smoke, which will respect the current wind speed and direction.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.Settings.FireWatcher.Des: Normally, if a wild fire spirals out of control long enough, the storyteller will summon rain. You can disable this feature here.
LanguageData.ScatteredFlames.ReloadRequired: These require reloading your save (you do not need to restart the entire game).
